info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 4:15PM MDT until June 30 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Union County in northeastern New Mexico... East central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 415 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Abbott, or 22 miles east of Springer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gladstone and Farley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rains from severe thunderstorms can produce sudden and dangerous flows in arroyos, ditches and over low water crossings. Do not attempt to drive through areas where water covers the roadway.
